mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed (iuser, location, ctnt) VALUES (${iuser}, #{location}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed, A.iuser, A.ctnt, A.location, A.regdt, B.ifeedImg, B.img, C.nm AS writer, C.mainProfile FROM t_feed A LEFT JOIN t_feed_img B ON A.ifeed = B.ifeed INNER JOIN t_user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC;
SELECT ifeedImg, ifeed, img FROM t_feed_img WHERE ifeed = #{ifeed}
